uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.pipeline

Class FastPipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.pipeline.FastPipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pipeline

    public class FastPipe
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pipeline
    Returns an object for running fast mode of fragment recruitment. This class is used in local mode only. For cluster mode, Spark RDD is used to parallelize the tasks.
    See Also:
